Täglich Neueingänge. Wir besorgen auch verlagsneue Bücher. Großes

möchten, bitten wir Sie, uns vorher anzurufen, da der Bestand zum Teil
auswärts gelagert ist.
-
We also deal in new books and provide in no time available new books.
We have in stock a lot of second-han records (classical music and jazz).
Please note: If you would like to look at books from our catalog in our shop, please call
beforehand, as some of the stock is stored externally.
